articles.title: Watch Gordon Murray’s £3.1m T.50s track car tribute to Niki Lauda - Daily Record
articles.description: They were once Formula One team-mates and now Gordon Murray is going to produce a tribute supercar that honours his ledgendary friend Niki Lauda. You can find out more and see a video gallery of the T.50s here.
articles.content:
EXCLUSIVE supercar maker Gordon Murray Automotive has unveiled its track-focussed T.50s Niki Lauda model.
Limited to a production run of just 25 and costing from £3.1million before taxes, the Britis… [+1608 chars]

articles.description: Realme's CEO started to tease the Realme 8 series. The Realme 8 Pro probably will be the first Realme smartphone with a 108MP camera.
